page.title: 10The Unexplained.
page.content: People in Braunton when asked don't talk about ghosts and mysterious happenings.There are however, some stories.A young man called Ernest was living at{Hartnoll farm}until 1951, when he moved into a cottage in Townend which backs onto the farm. While he was a young man,he said was convinced that the old house was haunted.He recounted to his mother how he had heard footsteps on the stairs at night,on more than one occasion. In{St.Michael's Chapel}a ghostly figure in clerical garb is supposed to have be seen moving amongst it's ruins.At{Buckland House a figure in white,is supposed to have been a former inhabitant of the house. He frightens passers-by in Buckland Wood by riding on horse back when there is a full moon.Are these stories true? Decide for yourself!
